transcript.text:
￼



















































Version 10.1 Release Notes
Front Store Feature

15 min
search enhancement search enhancement in this version, we have enhanced the front side search and changed the ui of the admin search front side as of now, on the front search if the search text is not exactly matched then the result will not appear, for a better search experience we have added the fuzzy search using fuzzy search if the search text is closely matched then the result will appear for the product section or template section or both based on the below site setting value on the search results screen, you can see the search history along with a link to view the advanced search results on clicking the link, the customer will be redirected to the advanced search page with all the results admin side on the admin side, we have changed the dropdown search to the tabbing view as per the existing search feature, the system was redirected to the specific section when the admin searched for anything for example, to search for any order details, the admin needed to select order from the dropdown menu and then search the order number in the search bar and they will be redirected to that order numbers detail page in version 10 1, we have further enhanced search functionality with the new changes, when the admin starts entering the characters in the search bar, the result will be displayed in the pop up the first half section will display the results from the admin panel menu and in the below, the results will be displayed from the three sections "orders", "customers", and "products" clicking on the search results will take the admin to the respective section for more details note to display the products and templates (new or modified) in the search results, you need to click on the publish button from the top right corner of the respective pages front store ui enhancements front store ui enhancements in this version, we have made some enhancements to the front store mobile responsive we have enhanced the mobile responsiveness of the browse design, and my account pages like order listing, my images, order details, quote listing, quote details, qr code page, and templates pages upload page we enhanced the ui of the upload center page to enhance the user experience and usability for the consumers product menu in this version, the cms section has been added to the product listing so that the admin may add any necessary content below the product listing block in the menu shopping cart page we have further enhanced the ui of our shopping cart to display the items lists and price summary separately, we have added blocks on the right side in all three stages now, if a customer wants to view an item that has been added to their cart, they may do so from the right side new minor features & enhancement new minor features & enhancement product wise metatag product wise metatag the default meta tag will be overwritten if a product or content specific meta tag with the same name is already available display sku on product info and additional info page display sku on product info and additional info page the product sku will be displayed in the price summary on the product info and additional info page display the department name on the profile display the department name on the profile in this version, store customer can see their department name on my account >> my profile page my images my images we have implemented the below enhancement in the “my images” section now, your customers can filter the stock images from the “my image” section customers can now delete the album which has the image, and all of the images in that specific album will be removed enable/disable the order feedback option enable/disable the order feedback option in this version, the admin can manage the order feedback option on the order detail page from the site setting " enable order feedback option in order details page front side " added a captcha on the payment method added a captcha on the payment method after failed payment attempts, we added a captcha for the online payment method chat chat now, the most recent order number and status as well as basic personal information like name and email address will be displayed in the chat window product url product url the url field in the product add/edit interface is unique to the entire site for example, if the url is set to "product" in one store, it cannot be set to "product" in any other store for any other product as a result, we have enhanced the url field, which will now be specific to a particular store so, if the url "product" is set for one product in one store and the other store does not have that product, the url may now be "product” order success page order success page there were several predefined variables on the order success page, but the admin also wanted to have more variables like first name, last name, and email address so, in this version, we introduced the above three variables in the order success page content the admin can manage variables according to their requirements phone number and department validation on contact us page phone number and department validation on contact us page in this version, we have added two new settings in site settings for managing the validation of the customer's phone number and department on the contact us page the admin will be able to manage how the details will be validated active & mandatory, active & non mandatory or disable
Did this page help you?
